text:
@BernieSanders @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson Americans need #MortgageFreeze, #RentFreeze #UtilityBillsFreeze.
A moratorium on evictions is insufficient!It only puts off the problem.Unless we freeze these bills during this crisis,a moratorium just means more debt people cannot pay! #SaveTheWorkers #PeoplesBailout #COVID19
